entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 24.
